feed.title: Combined summary - Bitcoin Knots 0.14.0 release candidate 2 available

entry.title: Combined summary - Bitcoin Knots 0.14.0 release candidate 2 available
entry.summary: Bitcoin Knots has released the second version of its 0.14.0 test version, which includes new features, bug fixes, and performance improvements. The preliminary release notes and source code are available on GitHub, with binaries available for download from the Bitcoin Knots website. Users are advised to verify the PGP signature of all downloads. This release candidate will be tagged as the final 0.14.0 version if no critical problems are found. Bugs can be reported using the GitHub issue tracker.
